snippet: TiVo is expected to announce on Tuesday that it has acquired TRA, a research company that has developed a system to match television viewing with consumer buying habits, The New York Times reports.
abstract: TiVo is expected to announce on Tuesday that it has acquired TRA, a research company that has developed a system to match television viewing with consumer buying habits, The New York Times reports.

headline.main: TiVo to Buy Consumer Research Company
